text: Dimaadua ga helekai gi ana daangada, “Goodou ulu i godou goloo manawa gee, gei gi llingia nia lehu gi hongo godou libogo. Goodou gi manawa gee gadoo be goodou ma ga manawa gee ang gi di godou dama daane hua e dahi dela guu made, idimaa, digau ala e lloomoi belee heebagi adu gi goodou, ga limalima hua gaa dae mai.
